Html:
Anyone that is interested in joining the project can send an email to ascend_adm@hotmail.com .

Please send a little about your development experience and if you have specific things you would like to do (new control, examples, work as assigned, etc…). Also include where you are located in the world. It doesn’t matter where you are but it helps to know for project communications.

I’ve not received a couple of emails that I’ve sent to this account so if you do not receive a response after a few days please try again. I respond to all requests to join the project.

Thanks,
scorn
